title: Bid on the star trek 6 se dvd
content:
this is my 1st auction i setup on ebay, the reason why i am selling it [url=http://www.ezydvd.com.au/item.zml/783007]here[/url] a boxset with all star trek movies is released tommorow (thursday 1 december) & i already have generations on dvd & nemesis on vhs & there is no point keeping these while i getting all 10 movies on dvd

i must apologize that only australians can bid cos it is too much confusion 4 me at this time to post internationaly but i'm not ruling it out in the future

you may start bidding [url=http://cgi.ebay.com.au/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=6458601916]here[/url]

bidding starts at AU$0.99 or you may purchase 4 AU$20.00 plus AU$7.00 P/H

& yes i will accept a money order or cheque or direct deposit into a st.george bank account[url=http://www.ironmaiden.com][img]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/e/eb/Iron_Stick_800.jpg/250px-Iron_Stick_800.jpg[/img][/url]

title: Re: Bid on the star trek 6 se dvd
content:
auction ends today 7/12/05 at 12:27pm AESDT
current bid is AU$6.50 if you want to get in you better hurry

UPDATE: auction ended, sold for AU$7.52[url=http://www.ironmaiden.com][img]http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/e/eb/Iron_Stick_800.jpg/250px-Iron_Stick_800.jpg[/img]

title: Re: Bid on the star trek 6 se dvd
content: Nice, you got some money of it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] Eat your veggies!
